name: Town Magicsmith
description: - Can check a player each night to see if they resonate magic
- All Wolves except Archangel, Doctor and Town Defector resonate magic
- Seers, Magicsmiths, Priests and Universal Hirstutes resonate magic
- PIs, Sheriffs, Vigilantes and Demon Wolves all resonate magic
- Wins when all threats to the town are dead
